rows.name: Absorbing Shield
rows.notes: +1 heavy steel; disintegrate on touch 1/2 days

rows.name: Adamantine Battleaxe
rows.notes: Masterwork; nonmagical

rows.name: Adamantine Breastplate
rows.notes: DR 2/–; nonmagical

rows.name: Adamantine Dagger
rows.notes: Masterwork; nonmagical

rows.name: Banded Mail of Luck
rows.notes: +3 banded; 1/week force an attack reroll

rows.name: Breastplate of Command
rows.notes: +2 breastplate; +2 competence to Cha checks & Leadership; morale aura to allies; cannot conceal to function

rows.name: Caster's Shield
rows.notes: +1 light wooden; reusable 1-spell strip (≤3rd) at 1/2 raw materials; 5% ASF
rows.required_feat: Craft Magic Arms and Armor, Scribe Scroll

rows.name: Celestial Armor
rows.notes: +3 chainmail; treated as light; Max Dex +8, ACP −2, ASF 15%; fly 1/day; good-aligned creator

rows.name: Darkwood Buckler
rows.notes: Light wooden; darkwood; 2.5 lb; no ACP; nonmagical

rows.name: Darkwood Shield
rows.notes: Heavy wooden; darkwood; 5 lb; no ACP; nonmagical

rows.name: Demon Armor
rows.notes: +4 full plate; claw attacks as +1; contagion on claw; bestows 1 negative level to nonevil wearer

rows.name: Ring of Djinni Calling
rows.notes: Calls a specific djinni 1 hour/day; becomes nonmagical if djinni dies

rows.name: Dwarven Plate
rows.notes: Full plate of adamantine; DR 3/–; nonmagical

rows.name: Dwarven Thrower
rows.notes: +2 warhammer; in dwarf hands +3 returning; thrown 30 ft; +2d8 vs giants or +1d8 vs others
rows.required_spells_note: Creator must be a dwarf of at least 10th level

rows.name: Ring of Elemental Command (Air)
rows.notes: All elemental command common props + listed air powers; appears as ring of feather falling until condition met

rows.name: Ring of Elemental Command (Earth)
rows.notes: All elemental command common props + listed earth powers; appears as ring of meld into stone until condition met

rows.name: Ring of Elemental Command (Fire)
rows.notes: All elemental command common props + listed fire powers; appears as major ring of energy resistance (fire) until condition met

rows.name: Ring of Elemental Command (Water)
rows.notes: All elemental command common props + listed water powers; appears as ring of water walking until condition met

rows.name: Ring of Energy Resistance (Greater)
rows.notes: Energy type chosen at creation; resistance 30

rows.name: Ring of Energy Resistance (Major)
rows.notes: Energy type chosen at creation; resistance 20

rows.name: Ring of Energy Resistance (Minor)
rows.notes: Energy type chosen at creation; resistance 10

rows.name: Elven Chain
rows.notes: Mithral chainmail; treated as light; 20 lb; ASF 20%, Max Dex +4, ACP −2; nonmagical

rows.name: Ring of Evasion
rows.notes: Evasion as continuous effect

rows.name: Ring of Feather Falling
rows.notes: Immediate feather fall on falling >5 ft

rows.name: Flame Tongue
rows.notes: +1 flaming burst longsword; 1/day 4d6 fire ray (30 ft, ranged touch)
required_spells: flame blade or flame strike or fireball

rows.name: Ring of Force Shield
rows.notes: Generates heavy shield-sized wall of force; no ACP/ASF; on/off free action

rows.name: Ring of Freedom of Movement
rows.notes: Continuous freedom of movement

rows.name: Ring of Friend Shield (Pair)
rows.notes: Two rings; either wearer can cast shield other on the other (no range limit)

rows.name: Frost Brand
rows.notes: +3 frost greatsword; sheds light <0°F; absorb first 10 fire/heal per round; extinguish nonmagical fires; dispel lasting fire spells (CL check +14)

rows.name: Greater Slaying Arrow
rows.notes: +1 arrow keyed to a type/subtype; DC 23 or die; death effect if living; table determines keyed type

rows.name: Holy Avenger
rows.notes: +2 cold iron longsword (becomes +5 holy cold iron in paladin hands); SR 5+level to wielder & adjacent; area greater dispel magic 1/round

rows.name: Ring of Invisibility
rows.notes: Invisibility on command

rows.name: Javelin of Lightning
rows.notes: Becomes 5d6 lightning bolt when thrown (Ref DC 14 half); consumed on use

rows.name: Life-Drinker
rows.notes: +1 greataxe; bestows 2 negative levels on hit (DC 16 negates 1 day later); wielder also gains 1 negative level for 1 hour on each hit

rows.name: Lion's Shield
rows.notes: +2 heavy steel; lion head bites 3/day as free action using wielder BAB; 2d6 damage

rows.name: Luck Blade (0 Wishes)
rows.notes: +2 short sword; +1 luck to saves; 1/day reroll any roll

rows.name: Luck Blade (1 Wish)
rows.notes: +2 short sword; +1 luck to saves; 1/day reroll any roll; 1 wish stored

rows.name: Luck Blade (2 Wishes)
rows.notes: +2 short sword; +1 luck to saves; 1/day reroll any roll; 2 wishes stored

rows.name: Luck Blade (3 Wishes)
rows.notes: +2 short sword; +1 luck to saves; 1/day reroll any roll; 3 wishes stored

rows.name: Mace of Smiting
rows.notes: +3 adamantine heavy mace; +5 vs constructs; crit vs construct destroys; crit vs outsider ×4

rows.name: Mace of Terror
rows.notes: +2 heavy mace; 3/day 30-ft cone fear (Will DC 16 partial); −2 morale to saves for affected

rows.name: Masterwork Cold Iron Longsword
rows.notes: Masterwork; nonmagical

rows.name: Ring of Mind Shielding
rows.notes: Immune to detect thoughts, discern lies, alignment detection

rows.name: Mithral Full Plate of Speed
rows.notes: +1 mithral full plate; haste up to 10 rounds/day (any split); ASF 25%, Max Dex +3, ACP −3; treated as medium

rows.name: Mithral Heavy Shield
rows.notes: 5% ASF; no ACP; 5 lb; nonmagical

rows.name: Mithral Shirt
rows.notes: Mithral chain shirt; ASF 10%, Max Dex +6, ACP 0; treated as light; nonmagical

rows.name: Nine Lives Stealer
rows.notes: +2 longsword; 9 stored death effects on crit DC 20; evil; good wielders gain 2 negative levels while held

rows.name: Oathbow
rows.notes: +2 composite longbow (+2 Str); sworn enemy 1/day: becomes +5, +2d6, ×4 crit; only MW vs others; −1 attack with other weapons; 7-day oath lockout

rows.name: Plate Armor of the Deep
rows.notes: +1 full plate; unarmored for Swim; water breathing; tongues vs aquatic; communicate; theme: waves & fish

rows.name: Ring of Protection +1
rows.notes: Deflection bonus +1 to AC
rows.required_spells_note: Caster level at least three times ring bonus

rows.name: Ring of Protection +2
rows.notes: Deflection bonus +2 to AC
rows.required_spells_note: Caster level at least three times ring bonus

rows.name: Ring of Protection +3
rows.notes: Deflection bonus +3 to AC
rows.required_spells_note: Caster level at least three times ring bonus

rows.name: Ring of Protection +4
rows.notes: Deflection bonus +4 to AC
rows.required_spells_note: Caster level at least three times ring bonus

rows.name: Ring of Protection +5
rows.notes: Deflection bonus +5 to AC
rows.required_spells_note: Caster level at least three times ring bonus

rows.name: Ring of the Ram
rows.notes: 50 charges; ranged force head 1–3 charges (1d6/2d6/3d6), bull rush Str 25 (+1/+2), open doors Str 25/27/29

rows.name: Rapier of Puncturing
rows.notes: +2 wounding rapier; 3/day touch attack deals 1d6 Con damage (creatures immune to crits are immune)

rows.name: Ring of Regeneration
rows.notes: Regenerate lost parts; heals 1 hp/level per hour; nonlethal 1/level per 5 min; only for damage taken while worn

rows.name: Rhino Hide
rows.notes: +2 hide; −1 ACP; +2d6 damage on charges (incl. mounted)

rows.name: Ring of Animal Friendship
rows.notes: As if wearer had cast charm animal

rows.name: Ring of Blinking
rows.notes: Blink on command

rows.name: Ring of Chameleon Power
rows.notes: +10 Hide competence; disguise self at will as standard action

rows.name: Ring of Climbing
rows.notes: +5 competence bonus on Climb checks
rows.required_spells_note: Creator must have 5 ranks in Climb

rows.name: Ring of Climbing, Improved
rows.notes: +10 competence bonus on Climb checks
rows.required_spells_note: Creator must have 10 ranks in Climb

rows.name: Ring of Counterspells
rows.notes: Holds 1 spell (1st–6th); auto-counters if cast on wearer; then emptied

rows.name: Ring of Jumping
rows.notes: +5 competence bonus on Jump checks
rows.required_spells_note: Creator must have 5 ranks in Jump

rows.name: Ring of Jumping, Improved
rows.notes: +10 competence bonus on Jump checks
rows.required_spells_note: Creator must have 10 ranks in Jump

rows.name: Ring of Shooting Stars
rows.notes: Duplicate canonical name; (kept single normalized row above)

rows.name: Ring of Spell Storing
rows.notes: Holds spells up to 5 levels

rows.name: Ring of Spell Storing (Major)
rows.notes: Holds spells up to 10 levels

rows.name: Ring of Spell Storing (Minor)
rows.notes: Holds spells up to 3 levels

rows.name: Ring of Spell Turning
rows.notes: 3/day reflect next 9 spell levels as spell turning

rows.name: Ring of Sustenance
rows.notes: No food/water; sleep 2h for benefits; attune 1 week

rows.name: Ring of Telekinesis
rows.notes: Telekinesis on command

rows.name: Ring of Three Wishes
rows.notes: Holds 3 wishes in rubies (1d3 remaining when found); becomes nonmagical when spent

rows.name: Ring of Water Walking
rows.notes: Continuous water walk

rows.name: Ring of Wizardry I
rows.notes: Doubles 1st-level arcane spell slots

rows.name: Ring of Wizardry II
rows.notes: Doubles 2nd-level arcane spell slots

rows.name: Ring of Wizardry III
rows.notes: Doubles 3rd-level arcane spell slots

rows.name: Ring of Wizardry IV
rows.notes: Doubles 4th-level arcane spell slots

rows.name: Ring of X-Ray Vision
rows.notes: See through materials (limits apply); Con damage 1/min after first 10 minutes/day

rows.name: Screaming Bolt
rows.notes: +2 bolt; screams; enemies within 20 ft of path DC 14 Will or shaken (mind-affecting, fear)

rows.name: Shatterspike
rows.notes: +1 longsword; if wielder has Improved Sunder: +4 to opposed sunder rolls; can damage up to +4 weapons
rows.required_feat: Craft Magic Arms and Armor, Power Attack, Improved Sunder

rows.name: Shifter's Sorrow
rows.notes: +1/+1 two-bladed sword (alchemical silver); +2d6 vs shapechangers; on hit DC 15 Will or revert to natural form

rows.name: Silver Dagger, Masterwork
rows.notes: Alchemical silver; masterwork; nonmagical

rows.name: Sleep Arrow
rows.notes: +1 arrow; on hit forces DC 11 Will save or fall asleep; deals nonlethal instead of lethal

rows.name: Slaying Arrow
rows.notes: +1 arrow keyed to a type/subtype; DC 20 Fort or die/destroy; death effect if living; table determines keyed type

rows.name: Spined Shield
rows.notes: +1 heavy steel; also a spiked shield; 3/day fire a +1 spine (RI 120 ft, 1d10, 19–20/×2); spines regenerate daily

rows.name: Note: No staves/wondrous specific items included
rows.notes: Staves/wondrous unique items not available in provided text; index pending

rows.name: Sun Blade
rows.notes: Bastard sword sized; behaves as shortsword for proficiency; +2 normally, +4 vs evil; ×3 crit vs undead/NE plane; 1/day daylight radiance expanding globe; good-aligned; evil wielder gains 1 neg level

rows.name: Sword of Life Stealing
rows.notes: +2 longsword; on crit bestows 1 negative level; wielder gains 1d6 temp hp per negative level (24h)

rows.name: Sword of the Planes
rows.notes: +1 longsword (Material); +2 on Elemental planes & vs elementals; +3 on Astral/Ethereal & vs natives; +4 on other planes & vs outsiders

rows.name: Sword of Subtlety
rows.notes: +1 short sword; when making a sneak attack: +4 to attack and damage

rows.name: Sylvan Scimitar
rows.notes: +3 scimitar; outdoors in temperate climates: Cleave feat and +1d6 damage
rows.required_spells_note: Alternatively, creator may be a 7th-level druid

rows.name: Trident of Fish Command
rows.notes: +1 trident; 3/day charm up to 14 HD aquatic animals (Will DC 16; +5 if currently being attacked by wielder); speak with animals (aquatic); unwilling won't approach within 10 ft

rows.name: Trident of Warning
rows.notes: +2 trident; scan 680-ft hemisphere in 1 round to detect aquatic predators (location, depth, kind, number)

rows.name: Dagger of Venom
rows.notes: +1 dagger; 1/day apply poison effect on hit (free action same round), DC 14

rows.name: Winged Shield
rows.notes: +3 heavy wooden round; feathered wings; 1/day fly carrying wielder (60 ft ≤133 lb; 40 ft ≤266 lb)

rows.name: Ring of Swimming
rows.notes: Continuously grants a +5 competence bonus on Swim checks.
rows.required_spells_note: Creator must have 5 ranks in the Swim skill

rows.name: Ring of Swimming, Improved
rows.notes: Continuously grants a +10 competence bonus on Swim checks.
rows.required_spells_note: Creator must have 10 ranks in the Swim skill

rows.name: Staff of Abjuration
rows.notes: Spells: shield(1), resist energy(1), dispel magic(1), lesser globe of invulnerability(2), dismissal(2), repulsion(3).

rows.name: Staff of Charming
rows.notes: Spells: charm person(1), charm monster(2).

rows.name: Staff of Conjuration
rows.notes: Spells: unseen servant(1), summon swarm(1), stinking cloud(1), minor creation(2), cloudkill(2), summon monster VI(3).

rows.name: Staff of Defense
rows.notes: Spells: shield(1), shield of faith(1), shield other(1), shield of law(3).

rows.name: Staff of Divination
rows.notes: Spells: detect secret doors(1), locate object(1), tongues(1), locate creature(2), prying eyes(2), true seeing(3).

rows.name: Staff of Earth and Stone
rows.notes: Spells: passwall(1), move earth(1).

rows.name: Staff of Enchantment
rows.notes: Spells: sleep(1), Tasha’s hideous laughter(1), suggestion(1), crushing despair(2), mind fog(2), mass suggestion(3).

rows.name: Staff of Evocation
rows.notes: Spells: magic missile(1), shatter(1), fireball(1), ice storm(2), wall of force(2), chain lightning(3).

rows.name: Staff of Fire
rows.notes: Spells: burning hands(1), fireball(1), wall of fire(2).

rows.name: Staff of Frost
rows.notes: Spells: ice storm(1), wall of ice(1), cone of cold(2).

rows.name: Staff of Healing
rows.notes: Spells: lesser restoration(1), cure serious wounds(1), remove blindness/deafness(2), remove disease(3).

rows.name: Staff of Illusion
rows.notes: Spells: disguise self(1), mirror image(1), major image(1), rainbow pattern(2), persistent image(2), mislead(3).

rows.name: Staff of Illumination
rows.notes: Spells: dancing lights(1), flare(1), daylight(2), sunburst(3).

rows.name: Staff of Life
rows.notes: Spells: heal(1), raise dead(5).

rows.name: Staff of Necromancy
rows.notes: Spells: cause fear(1), ghoul touch(1), halt undead(1), enervation(2), waves of fatigue(2), circle of death(3).

rows.name: Staff of Passage
rows.notes: Spells: dimension door(1), passwall(1), phase door(2), greater teleport(2), astral projection(2).

rows.name: Staff of Power
rows.notes: +2 quarterstaff; +2 luck bonus to AC/saves; retributive strike. Spells: magic missile(1), ray of enfeeblement (heightened to 5th)(1), continual flame(1), levitate(1), lightning bolt (heightened to 5th)(1), fireball (heightened to 5th)(1), cone of cold(2), hold monster(2), wall of force (hemisphere only)(2), globe of invulnerability(2).
rows.required_feat: Craft Staff; Craft Magic Arms and Armor

rows.name: Staff of Size Alteration
rows.notes: Spells: enlarge person(1), reduce person(1), shrink item(1), mass enlarge person(1), mass reduce person(1).

rows.name: Staff of Swarming Insects
rows.notes: Spells: summon swarm(1), insect plague(3).

rows.name: Staff of Transmutation
rows.notes: Spells: expeditious retreat(1), alter self(1), blink(1), polymorph(2), baleful polymorph(2), disintegrate(3).

rows.name: Staff of the Woodlands
rows.notes: +2 quarterstaff; pass without trace at will. Spells: charm animal(1), speak with animals(1), barkskin(2), wall of thorns(3), summon nature’s ally VI(3), animate plants(4).
rows.required_feat: Craft Staff; Craft Magic Arms and Armor

rows.name: Amulet of Mighty Fists +1
rows.notes: Creator’s caster level must be at least three times the amulet’s bonus.

rows.name: Amulet of Proof against Detection and Location
rows.notes: Functions as nondetection (DC 19 caster level check to overcome).

rows.name: Apparatus of Kwalish
rows.notes: Also requires Knowledge (architecture and engineering) 8 ranks.

rows.name: Bag of Holding (Type I)
rows.notes: Holds up to 250 lb.; volume limit 30 cu. ft. External weight 15 lb.

rows.name: Bag of Holding (Type II)
rows.notes: Holds up to 500 lb.; volume limit 70 cu. ft. External weight 25 lb.

rows.name: Bag of Holding (Type III)
rows.notes: Holds up to 1,000 lb.; volume limit 150 cu. ft. External weight 35 lb.

rows.name: Bag of Holding (Type IV)
rows.notes: Holds up to 1,500 lb.; volume limit 250 cu. ft. External weight 60 lb.

rows.name: Bag of Tricks (Gray)
rows.notes: Up to ten animals per week; one at a time; random.

rows.name: Bag of Tricks (Rust)
rows.notes: Up to ten animals per week; one at a time; random.

rows.name: Bag of Tricks (Tan)
rows.notes: Up to ten animals per week; one at a time; random.

rows.name: Belt, Monk’s
rows.notes: Also grants +1 daily Stunning Fist use; non-monks gain AC and unarmed damage of 5th-level monk.

rows.name: Belt of Dwarvenkind
rows.notes: Creator must be a dwarf. Grants darkvision 60 ft., stonecunning, Con +2, and save bonuses to non-dwarves.

rows.name: Boat, Folding
rows.notes: Creator must have Craft (shipmaking) 2 ranks. Three command words toggle box/boat/ship.

rows.name: Boots of Elvenkind
rows.notes: Grants +5 competence bonus on Move Silently checks; creator must be an elf.

rows.name: Boots of Striding and Springing
rows.notes: Also requires creator to have 5 ranks in Jump.

rows.name: Bracers of Archery, Greater
rows.required_feat: Craft Wondrous Item, Craft Magic Arms and Armor

rows.name: Bracers of Archery, Lesser
rows.required_feat: Craft Wondrous Item, Craft Magic Arms and Armor

rows.name: Bracers of Armor +1
rows.notes: Creator’s caster level must be at least twice the bracers’ bonus.

rows.name: Bracers of Armor +2
rows.notes: Creator’s caster level must be at least twice the bracers’ bonus.

rows.name: Bracers of Armor +3
rows.notes: Creator’s caster level must be at least twice the bracers’ bonus.

rows.name: Bracers of Armor +4
rows.notes: Creator’s caster level must be at least twice the bracers’ bonus.

rows.name: Bracers of Armor +5
rows.notes: Creator’s caster level must be at least twice the bracers’ bonus.

rows.name: Bracers of Armor +6
rows.notes: Creator’s caster level must be at least twice the bracers’ bonus.

rows.name: Bracers of Armor +7
rows.notes: Creator’s caster level must be at least twice the bracers’ bonus.

rows.name: Bracers of Armor +8
rows.notes: Creator’s caster level must be at least twice the bracers’ bonus.

rows.name: Broom of Flying
rows.notes: Flies up to 9 hours/day; 200 lb at 40 ft, 400 lb at 30 ft; can travel unattended to known destination within ~300 yards; speed 40 ft without rider.

rows.name: Candle of Invocation
rows.notes: Aligned; allies within 30 ft gain +2 morale to attacks/saves/skills when alignment matches; matching cleric counts as +2 levels for spells/day while burning; can be consumed to cast gate.

rows.name: Candle of Truth
rows.notes: Creates 5-ft-radius zone of truth (DC 13) for 1 hour while burning; snuffing ruins the candle.

rows.name: Cape of the Mountebank
rows.notes: 1/day dimension door; leaves smoke cloud at origin and destination.

rows.name: Carpet of Flying (5 ft. by 5 ft.)
rows.notes: Capacity 200 lb; speed 40 ft; average maneuverability; can hover; carrying up to double capacity reduces speed to 30 ft.

rows.name: Carpet of Flying (5 ft. by 10 ft.)
rows.notes: Capacity 400 lb; speed 40 ft; average maneuverability; can hover; carrying up to double capacity reduces speed to 30 ft.

rows.name: Carpet of Flying (10 ft. by 10 ft.)
rows.notes: Capacity 800 lb; speed 40 ft; average maneuverability; can hover; carrying up to double capacity reduces speed to 30 ft.

rows.name: Censer of Controlling Air Elementals
rows.notes: Lighting incense and speaking words summons 1 Large air elemental (as summon monster VI); with incense of meditation, summons an elder air elemental (as summon monster IX). Only one elemental at a time.

rows.name: Chaos Diamond
rows.notes: Each listed power usable 1d4/day. Nonchaotic possessor gains a negative level while possessed.

rows.name: Chime of Interruption
rows.notes: Struck 1/10 minutes; resonates 3 minutes; casters within 30 ft require Concentration check DC 15 + spell level for verbal-component spells.

rows.name: Chime of Opening
rows.notes: Opens/loosens targets in 1 round; 10 total uses; also dispels hold portal and arcane lock by casters <15th; silenced if under silence.

rows.name: Circlet of Blasting, Minor
rows.notes: 1/day searing light (3d8).

rows.name: Circlet of Blasting, Major
rows.notes: 1/day maximized searing light (5d8 → 40).

rows.name: Circlet of Persuasion
rows.notes: +3 competence bonus on all Charisma-based checks.

rows.name: Cloak of Arachnida
rows.notes: Spider climb effect; immunity to web entrapment; move through webs at half speed; 1/day cast web; +2 luck vs spider poison.

rows.name: Cloak of the Bat
rows.notes: +5 competence on Hide; hang from ceilings; fly as spell or polymorph to bat in darkness only; flight power then must recharge over like period.

rows.name: Cloak of Charisma +2
rows.notes: +2 enhancement to Charisma.

rows.name: Cloak of Charisma +4
rows.notes: +4 enhancement to Charisma.

rows.name: Cloak of Charisma +6
rows.notes: +6 enhancement to Charisma.

rows.name: Cloak of Displacement, Minor
rows.notes: Constant 20% miss chance (as displacement).

rows.name: Cloak of Displacement, Major
rows.notes: As displacement; total 15 rounds/day, split as desired.

rows.name: Cloak of Elvenkind
rows.notes: +5 competence on Hide; creator must be an elf.

rows.name: Cloak of Etherealness
rows.notes: Ethereal jaunt on command; up to 10 minutes/day, dismissible.

rows.name: Cloak of the Manta Ray
rows.notes: +3 natural armor; swim 60 ft; underwater breathing; tail spine attack 1d6 as secondary; arms can be freed without losing swim speed.

rows.name: Cloak of Resistance +1
rows.notes: Grants resistance bonus on all saves; creator level must be at least 3× bonus.

rows.name: Cloak of Resistance +2
rows.notes: Grants resistance bonus on all saves; creator level must be at least 3× bonus.

rows.name: Cloak of Resistance +3
rows.notes: Grants resistance bonus on all saves; creator level must be at least 3× bonus.

rows.name: Cloak of Resistance +4
rows.notes: Grants resistance bonus on all saves; creator level must be at least 3× bonus.

rows.name: Cloak of Resistance +5
rows.notes: Grants resistance bonus on all saves; creator level must be at least 3× bonus.

rows.name: Crystal Ball
rows.notes: Scrying device; Will DC 16 negates for target.

rows.name: Crystal Ball (See Invisibility)
rows.notes: As crystal ball; includes see invisibility.

rows.name: Crystal Ball (Detect Thoughts)
rows.notes: As crystal ball; includes detect thoughts (Will DC 13).

rows.name: Crystal Ball (Telepathy)
rows.notes: As crystal ball; telepathic communication and 1/day suggestion (DC 14).

rows.name: Crystal Ball (True Seeing)
rows.notes: As crystal ball; includes true seeing.

rows.name: Cube of Force
rows.notes: 10-ft cube personal wall of force; 36 charges renewed daily; face modes with charge/minute and speed limits; high damage drains extra charges.
